Vitalik: Traditional Money Struggles to Solve Public Goods Problems

In March 2020, Ethereum co-founder Vitalik said in an interview with Lex Fridman that both online and in the real world, many public goods involve concentrated costs and distributed benefits. Such activities are difficult to incentivize through traditional monetary mechanisms, as individuals bear the full cost while capturing only a portion of the benefit, leading to the "tragedy of the commons". To address this, he introduced the concept of Quadratic Funding, which amplifies the impact of many small contributions to better compensate the social value of public goods. Vitalik believes this approach offers a new incentive model for the long-term sustainability of public goods and has already been explored within the crypto ecosystem.

There is so much usual information on this chart that is hard to know where to start. A minimum price of $5,000 is Ethereum's next target. This is very easy to see when considering the overall chart structure. Ethereum loves to produce double-tops.

We have a long-term double top, 2025 vs 2021. There was also a triple-top in 2024: March, May and December.

The low from November last year is a very strong higher low compared to the start of the bullish wave, April 2025. This same low is also a higher low compared to June 2025, so the third in a sequence. Higher lows lead to higher highs.

This most basic signal is what opens $5,000 as the next target, but this resistance isn't likely to be the end. Let's see what else the chart is saying.

The action is now happening right above the 0.618 Fib. extension level shown on the chart. This is a very important level. It matches EMA89 weekly.

Whenever ETHUSDT trades above EMA89, the market tends to become extremely bullish. EMA89 is very significant because prices went below this level for several weeks. Support was being challenged and this week ETH is moving above for the first time since the breakdown in November. EMA144 is the longer moving average that worked as support.

Now we have both EMA89 and EMA144 working as support coupled with the 0.618 Fib. extension ($3,068). The week closes tomorrow so this will be a major development and the start of bullish momentum as the recovery and bullish continuation takes place.

If you are active with our ETHUSDT 15X LONG, there are two major resistance zones to consider: (1) Right around $4,050 and (2) $5,000. It is very likely that Ether will continue growing after meeting these levels but a stop, a retrace, can happen at $4,050 and a correction at $5,000 and only afterward we get additional growth.
